worker.input_worker module¶

datedAlexaCSV(split_list)[source]¶

Creates a list of URLs from the Alexa top Million Websites with corresponding dated Sources.

The Data provided by Alexa is a CSV-file with each line consisting of a number and an URL.

Parameters:split_list – List of Numbers according to which the Sources are to be divided to. MUST NOT BE EMPTY!
Returns:List of Entries, each a List containing: a String of a Target-URL and a List of Source-Strings.
getAlexaCSV()[source]¶

Downloads the alexa top 1 million list.

Returns:Todays date
updateDownloadDate()[source]¶

Creates a date, that will be used to check if a new version of the alexa top-1m.csv is available. The new list should be available on 20th every month.

Changes variable nextDownloadDate to the date, when a new list should be available.

joinLists(listA, listB)[source]¶

Joins together two URL-Source-Lists without duplicates.

ListA is extended by the entries of listB and will be the joined list. If the same URL occurs in both lists, that entry’s source-list in listB is added to listA .

Parameters:
  • listA – URL-Source-List. MUST BE SORTED!, MUST NOT BE EMPTY!
  • listB – URL-Source-List. MUST BE SORTED!, MUST NOT BE EMPTY!
Returns:

The joined URL-Source-List.
joinListOfLists(CountryLists)[source]¶

Merges a whole list of URL-Source-Lists into a single URL-Source-Lists via the joinLists Method.

Parameters:CountryLists – List of URL-Source-Lists. MUST NOT BE EMPTY!
Returns:The joined URL-Source-List.
class DownLoader(url)[source]¶

Downloader to get all necessary information.

download()[source]¶

Creates a browser to get all necessary information. This information will be stored in self.contents :return: NULL

class alexaParser(url)[source]¶

Bases: worker.input_worker.DownLoader

Class for parsing alexa.com/topsites/countries*

getSiteNames()[source]¶

Downloads the specified url and fetches the links to all countrie top 500 sites. This links will be stored in self.topsiteShort :return: NULL

getContent(shortName, countrieName, today)[source]¶

Fetches all sites in the top 500 for the country with short name shortName.

Parameters:
  • shortName – The two Letter shortName of the wanted country
  • countrieName – full name of the country
  • today – todays date
Returns:

a sorted list with all 500 entries as [[“url1”,[date+countryName]],”url2”,[date+countryName],...]
startTop500Parsing()[source]¶

Contains all necessary information to start the top 500 parsing.

Returns:returns a multi-dimensional array with all countries and their top 500 websites, as a sorted list with all 500 entries as [[[“url1”,[date+countryName1]],”url2”,[date+countryName1],...],
[[“url1”,[date+countryName2]],”url2”,[date+countryName2],...],
... ]
fetchInput(queue_manager)[source]¶

Downloads top-1m.csv, parses top500 country lists, merges them and sends them to queue_manager.
